              </a>


            <h4 class="teaser__header_text">
                <a href="#" class="teaser__header_text_link">Quorum sensing control of Type VI secretion factors restricts the proliferation of quorum-sensing mutants 1</a>
            </h4>

            <div class="teaser__secondary_info">
              Charlotte Majerczyk et al.
            </div>

          </header>

          <div class="teaser__body">
            Quorum-sensing control of <i>Burkholderia thailandensis</i> toxin and immunity pairs serves to police quorum-sensing mutants and may represent a general strategy whereby cooperators can police mutants.
          </div>

            <h4 class="teaser__header_text">
                <a href="#" class="teaser__header_text_link">The global antigenic diversity of swine influenza A viruses 4</a>
            </h4>

            <div class="teaser__secondary_info">
              Nicola S Lewis et al.
            </div>

          </header>

          <div class="teaser__body">
            Swine populations worldwide are sporadically infected by influenza viruses from humans and birds leading to geographically heterogeneous swine influenza virus populations that pose epizootic and pandemic threats.
          </div>
